participant_1.background:
My home is in Pittsburgh, where I am able to find inspiration and capture the beauty of the city through my camera.
i grew up in alabama.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
i saw a solar eclipse when i was 8 years old.

content.text: Hello! I'm from Pittsburgh PA, where do you live?
I'm from California but I live in DC now.
I got a job as a lawyer here.
Oh cool! I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
That's awesome! I love my son and I volunteer in his boy scout troop.
Nice! I love scuba diving and I also like to watch movie reviews. What's your favorite movie?
I think my favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption.
That's one of my favorites too! What was your favorite thing about it?
I love the story of hope and redemption.
That's a great choice! I also love the soundtrack.
